data_processing_notice: This community collects and processes your data accordingly
collect_information: We may collect various types of information, including:
name_username_email: Your name, username, and email address
posts_comments_content: Posts, comments, and other content you submit
visit_privacy_policy: For more information please visit our
data_utilization_description: We utilize this data exclusively to tailor your involvement within this community, and also to link the content you create with your user account. During registration, you were requested to furnish a username and email address. You also have the option to supply supplementary details to enhance your user profile on this site.
data_retention_rights: This data remains in our possession throughout the existence of your user account, and you hold the right to revoke your consent anytime by deleting your account. You are also entitled to request a copy of your contributions to this website through the Rights & Consent page, whenever you wish.
data_security_description: We prioritize the security of your data and implement measures to protect it from unauthorized access or disclosure.
email_notifications_description: Periodically, we'll email your registered address for updates and relevant notifications. You can adjust community digest frequency and email notification preferences in your user settings. This community doesn't send email digests unless changed in settings.
contact_us_email: If you have questions about this privacy notice, please contact us at privacy@nodeblogger.com.
consent_data_processing: I allow consent to the collection and processing of my personal information on this website.
consent_email_notifications: I allow consent to receive digest and notification emails from this website.
